title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Up for auction are 2 lots that will use the LIFO system to determine the winner.** 1 @ 0.0001BTC, 2 @ 0.0001BTC, etc up to 10 @ for each LOT**LOT 1: 2015 Denarium 1/100th coins, brass x10Each coin is loaded with 0.01BTC and can be checked at the official Denarium lookup or use a first bits explorerhttps://status.denarium.com/coin/STARTING BID PER COIN: 0.0100BTCLOT 2: 2021/2022 1Holdclub Casino 6-Chip sets x 10Bitcoin: 500 Bits Brass, 500 Bits Copper, 500 Bits Orange ClayLitecoin: 0.1 Brass, 0.1 Copper, 0.1 Blue ClaySTARTING BID PER CHIP SET: 0.0100BTCSTARTING BID PER COIN/CHIP PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER COIN/CHIP PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 26th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
